DOC.brief_title: Effect Plant Omega-3 Omega-6 Fatty Acids Exercise Performance
DOC.detailed_description: Double-blind placebo control study two group : PUFA supplement group ( 5 week ) placebo ( corn syrup ) group . Participants match initial exercise performance assign two group systematically initial group mean similar . This do ranking individual high low assign participant high score randomly treatment group placebo group . Then , next two individual rank , high two assigned placebo group treatment group . This procedure repeat participant pair . Of course , do separately men woman average men great exercise performance score . Dosage 3.8 capsules/70kg body mass ( rounded nearest capsule ; 1 capsule contains 369mg PUFA Flax , Evening Primrose , Pumpkin , Sunflower , Coconut oil ; < 4 Calories ) isoenergetic placebo capsule ( contain corn syrup ) plus 2 capsule 20 minute prior exercise workout . Eighteen recreationally active student volunteer ( 18-35 year old ) recruit complete 4 exercise test : cycle time trial ( ~15 minute ) , cycle maximal power test ( 30 second Wingate test ) , maximal aerobic power test ( run treadmill test ) plus strength/endurance test ( number bench press 60 kg load ) pre- post 5 week daily supplementation . There accommodation day pre-study participant familiarize test use . Each exercise test complete separate day least 48 hour test day due fatigue nature testing .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , Recreationally active ( defined attend gym play sport 23 time week ) , Nonpregnant student volunteer .
